title: Fresh Italian parsley salad
time: Hands on time 15 mins, plus cooling
description: This is a delicious salad recipe made up of flatleaf parsley and couscous.
ingredients: Grated zest and juice of 1 lemon
25g black olives, pitted and finely chopped

method.Step 1: Put the couscous and tomatoes in a large heatproof bowl and pour over 50ml boiling water. Leave to cool.

method.Step 2: Stir in the oil, lemon zest and juice, olives and some seasoning. Toss through the parsley to serve.
